name: Responsive Search Widget
author: Erin McIntyre

sections.description: A responsive search widget with a search field that re-sizes in response to user screen size.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Drag the ‘Responsive Search’ widget into the sidebar.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin provides a search field that re-sizes to fit the screen size of the user.
sections.changelog:

  • Tested up to WordPress version 6.4.2

1.1.1

  • Improved appearance in sidebar with additional padding

1.1.0

  • Update to screenshot and author information

1.0.0

  • Original
